name: deepposter-tests
description: E2E Tests f√ºr DeepPoster WordPress Plugin

scripts.cy:run:log: echo '=== CYPRESS_LOG_START $(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S) ===' && mkdir -p cypress/logs && cypress run | tee cypress/logs/$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).log && echo '=== CYPRESS_LOG_END ===' && LATEST_LOG=$(ls -t cypress/logs | head -n1) && echo '=== LOG_CONTENT_START ===' && cat cypress/logs/$LATEST_LOG && echo '=== LOG_CONTENT_END ==='
